p: Following GC/MS (Gas chromatography/mass spectrometry) analysis, the components of Origanum dubium Boiss. (Lamiaceae) ( O. dubium) and Cinnamomum cassia (L.) J. Presl. (Lauraceae) ( C. cassia) oils and their relative percentage amounts are shown in Table 1 and Table 2. The major components of O. dubium and C. cassia were identified as Carvacrol (88.3%) and Cinnamaldehyde (91.8%), respectively.
